title: VR-Based Psychological Safety Environment Creation Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and basic classroom management concepts
context.additional_context: Real-time interactive curriculum emphasizing VR simulation learning through digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more conflict scenario simulations in VR environments and select appropriate intervention strategies
Learners can observe and document students' emotional responses in classrooms with 80% accuracy
Learners can evaluate their interaction styles using a VR feedback system and propose three or more improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
